## Mind Sized World Models

See original description and discussion in @bardi_mind_2013, @bardi_toward_2019.

### One-Stock Model

#### Description



::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}
![](models-Bardi_files/figure-pdf/unnamed-chunk-3-1.pdf)
:::
:::



$$
\frac{dN}{dt} = k_0 - k_1 \cdot N(t)
$$

*Variables*:

$N$: stock

$k_0$: growth rate

$k_1$: consumption/loss rate
